resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105416</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105416</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204512</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Anatomy of the heart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anatomie des Inneren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anatomie du coeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anatomy do coração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anatomia del cuore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανατομία της καρδιάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Anatomía del corazón</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for Grade 7 English Language Development and Science. Students develop their knowledge of the circulatory system by studying the structure and function of the heart and its vessels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für englische 
Sprachenentwicklung und Wissenschaft des Grad-7. Kursteilnehmer 
entwickeln ihr Wissen des zirkulierenden Systems, indem sie die 
Struktur und die Funktion des Inneren und seiner Behälter studieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour le développement et la 
Science d'anglais de la catégorie 7. Les étudiants 
développent leur connaissance du système circulatoire en étudiant 
la structure et la fonction du coeur et de ses navires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para o desenvolvimento e a 
ciência da língua inglesa da classe 7. Os estudantes 
desenvolvem seu conhecimento do sistema circulatório estudando a 
estrutura e a função do coração e de suas embarcações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per sviluppo e scienza di
linguaggio inglese del grado 7. Gli allievi sviluppano la loro 
conoscenza del sistema circolatorio studiando la struttura e la 
funzione del cuore e dei relativi vasi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για το βαθμό 7 αγγλική γλωσσική
ανάπτυξη και επιστήμη. Οι σπουδαστές αναπτύσσουν τη γνώση 
τους του κυκλοφοριακού συστήματος με τη μελέτη της δομής και της 
λειτουργίας της καρδιάς και των σκαφών του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para el desarrollo y la 
ciencia del lenguaje inglés del grado 7. Los estudiantes 
desarrollan su conocimiento del sistema circulatorio estudiando la 
estructura y la función del corazón y de sus recipientes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
